title: Overspill
creator_contributor_role: National Film Board of Canada, production company
subject_group: Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Economic development

description: A film about Norrbotten, in northernmost Sweden, where industrial and agricultural patterns have changed and people are being relocated in industrial towns far from the life they have loved. In a series of interviews we meet people who have known the dignity of independence and who have suddenly become welfare cases. The film asks: Are their lives being improved? How can we reconcile human values and economic needs?
